description: Vercel Project Manager TUI - List and delete Vercel projects from terminal

userStories.title: Initialize Go project with TUI dependencies
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the project scaffolded with bubbletea and lipgloss so I can build the TUI.
acceptanceCriteria: Go module initialized with go mod init vercel-tui
Add dependencies: github.com/charmbracelet/bubbletea, github.com/charmbracelet/lipgloss, github.com/charmbracelet/bubbles
Create main.go with minimal bubbletea program that displays 'Hello Vercel TUI' and quits on 'q'
go build succeeds

userStories.title: Prompt for Bearer token on startup
userStories.description: As a user, I want to enter my Vercel API token so the CLI can authenticate with Vercel.
acceptanceCriteria: On startup, show input prompt for Bearer token using bubbles/textinput
Input is masked (shows * for each character)
Press Enter to submit token
Store token in model struct for session use
Show error message if token is empty after submit
go build succeeds

userStories.title: Fetch projects from Vercel API
userStories.description: As the system, I need to call Vercel API to get the list of projects.
acceptanceCriteria: Create api/client.go with FetchProjects(token string) ([]Project, error) function
Project struct has ID and Name fields
Call GET https://api.vercel.com/v9/projects with Authorization: Bearer header
Parse JSON response and return slice of Project
Return error with message if status code is not 200
go build succeeds

userStories.title: Display project list in TUI
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see all my Vercel projects listed so I can decide which to delete.
acceptanceCriteria: After token entry, show loading spinner/message while fetching
Display project names in scrollable list using bubbles/list
Show error message if API call fails
Arrow keys or j/k navigate the list
go build succeeds

userStories.title: Delete single project
userStories.description: As a user, I want to select a project and delete it.
acceptanceCriteria: Add DeleteProject(token, projectID string) error function to api/client.go
Call DELETE https://api.vercel.com/v9/projects/{projectId}
Press Enter on selected project shows confirmation prompt 'Delete PROJECT_NAME? (y/n)'
Press 'y' calls DeleteProject and shows success message
Press 'n' or Escape cancels and returns to list
Refresh list after successful deletion
go build succeeds

userStories.title: Batch select multiple projects
userStories.description: As a user, I want to select multiple projects at once for batch deletion.
acceptanceCriteria: Press Space toggles selection on current item
Selected items show [x] prefix, unselected show [ ]
Track selected project IDs in model
Show count of selected items in status bar (e.g. '3 selected')
go build succeeds

userStories.title: Batch delete selected projects
userStories.description: As a user, I want to delete all selected projects at once.
acceptanceCriteria: Press 'd' when items are selected shows confirmation 'Delete N projects? (y/n)'
Press 'y' deletes projects sequentially with progress indicator
Show summary after completion: 'Deleted X projects, Y failed'
Refresh list after batch deletion
go build succeeds

userStories.title: Add keyboard help and quit functionality
userStories.description: As a user, I want intuitive keyboard controls and help text.
acceptanceCriteria: Press 'q' or Ctrl+C quits the application
Show help text at bottom: 'j/k: navigate | space: select | enter: delete | d: delete selected | q: quit'
Help text styled with lipgloss (subtle color)
go build succeeds
